title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.9 - Inspection of equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4117.9 - Inspection of equipment

State Regulations

Every driver shall examine the shoes and all equipment to
ascertain that they are in proper condition before going to the post
parade. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4117.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
